revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MSI |model=RG54G |revision=2 (MS-6848) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/25/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=I4L-MS6848 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intersil |cpu1_model=ISL3893 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160ABTC-90 |fla1_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V641620HG |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3893 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3686 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SB |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=RG54G2 |default_ssid_regex=^RG54G2$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Wireless 802.11g Residential Gateway'''
[http://www.msi.com/product/net/RG54G2.html Product page]
Per the FCC photos... *"P05-684800B" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" appears to be silkscreened on the board. *The Flash chip ''appears'' to be a ''Macronix'' MX29LV160ABTC-90 (2 MB). *The RAM chip ''appears'' to be a ''Hynix'' HY57V641620HG (8 MB). *The Switch ''appears'' to be a ''Realtek'' RTL8305SB.
Per additional FCC docs... *The Tx output power of the device is 17 dBm ( +- 1 dBm). *The device has dimensions (WxDxH) of [[Dimensions::180 mm x 127.7 mm x 32 mm]]. *The device weighs [[Weight::295 g]].
The default SSID is RG54G2 (it is in the manual). :There are approximately 400 entries for the SSID currently in WiGLE.
